item.title: 17 How To Clean A Bathtub With Bleach Gif
item.description: 17+ How To Clean A Bathtub With Bleach Gif. Bleach can work miracles for tub surfaces. How to clean a toilet with bleach. Fantastik Multi Surface Cleaners With Bleach Sc Johnson Professional from www.scjohnson-professional.com If proper upkeep is not maintained in a bathtub, mildew, mold and soap scum will naturally collect on the surface and edges. When unclogging a bathtub with bleach, first get all of the water out of the tub by either waiting until it has drained or by removing the water with a cup or this is how the bleach clears the drain as well, especially from hair wads that might be clogging it up.
